feed.entry:
Famous Firmware A simple analog firmware.
The ID tag has the host, the original date and the name dir and name This id-tag should never change for a given entry <--> tag:BoPunk,2009-01-12:/firm1
2005-11-10T00:23:47Z 2005-11-11T11:56:34Z
John Doe http://localhost/ john@example.org
Bill http://localhost/bill/ bill@example.com
